name: ELEX WooCommerce USPS Shipping Method
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
ELEX WooCommerce USPS Shipping plugin will help you to Automate USPS shipping by displaying shipping rates on the Cart and Checkout page. Displays Live Shipping Rates based on the Shipping Address and Cart Content.

Introduction

ELEX USPS Shipping Method for WooCommerce helps to automate USPS (US Postal Service) shipping integration. The basic version of the plugin helps you to get shipping rates from USPS APIs based on the shipping address and cart content. Based on the postal codes and other parameters, all available shipping services along with the rates are listed for the customers to choose from.

Integrates WooCommerce to USPS

Once the USPS plugin is installed and configured with the necessary information (please visit the installation section for more info), your WordPress/WooCommerce Shop will be ready to ship using the USPS. This plugin will add the USPS shipping method as one of the shipping methods in WooCommerce.

The plugin fetches USPS postage rates for both domestic and international shipping services based on various parameters like product weight, box dimensions and shipping destination.

While checking out, your customer is presented with the available shipping services and the rates based on the shipping address and cart content. The Customer can choose the best method that matches his/her requirements and proceed to payment. The plugin displays retail or account-specific online & offline rates to the WooCommerce cart and checkout page along with Estimated delivery days.

Main Features

  • Access USPS Real-time Rates.
  • Choose Click-N-Ship rates (Online rates) or Post Office rates (Offline rates).
  • Restrict Media Mails.
  • Set Fallback Rate.

Premium version Features

ELEX WooCommerce USPS Shipping Method Premium version automates your complete shipping process, which includes Rates, Label Printing with Postage and Shipment Tracking.

  • Label Printing with Postage using USPS e-VS (Electronic Verification System).
  • USPS Shipment Tracking: Automatic USPS shipment tracking info while generating the label.
  • Packaging Options: Box Packing and Weight-Based Packing. Basic version only supports individual packing items.
  • Customisation: Edit the names of services and add handling costs to shipping services.
  • Many more customization options.
  • If you are looking for USPS Label printing with Postage for normal(non-eVS, low volume) USPS accounts, we recommend ELEX Stamps.com WooCommerce USPS plugin.
  • Timely compatibility updates and bug fixes.
  • Premium support!

For complete list of features and details, please visit ELEX USPS Shipping Method for WooCommerce

WooCommerce Shipment Tracking – Premium Feature – Video

USPS Services

USPS Domestic Services:
* First-Class Mail® Large Envelope
* First-Class™ Postcard
* First-Class™ Large Postcards
* First-Class™ Stamped Letter
* First-Class Mail® Metered Letter
* USPS Ground Advantage™
* USPS Ground Advantage™ HAZMAT
* USPS Ground Advantage™ Hold For Pickup
* USPS Ground Advantage™ Parcel Locker
* USPS Ground Advantage™ Cubic HAZMAT
* USPS Ground Advantage™ Cubic
* USPS Ground Advantage™ Cubic Hold For Pickup
* USPS Ground Advantage™ Cubic Parcel Locker
* Priority Mail Express™ Hold for Pickup
* Priority Mail Express™
* Priority Mail Express™ Sunday/Holiday
* Media Mail
* Library Mail
* Priority Mail®
* Priority Mail® Keys and IDs
* Priority Mail® Hold For Pickup
* Priority Mail® Regional Rate Box A
* Priority Mail® Regional Rate Box B

USPS International Services:
* Priority Mail Express International™
* Priority Mail International®
* Global Express Guaranteed® (GXG)
* Global Express Guaranteed® Envelope
* Global Express Guaranteed® Non-Document Rectangular
* Global Express Guaranteed® Non-Document Non-Rectangular
* USPS GXG™ Envelope
* First Class Package Service™ International Letters
* First Class Package Service™ International Large Envelope
* First Class Package International Service™
* International Postcards

About USPS

The United States Postal Service (USPS; also known as the Post Office, U.S. Mail, or Postal Service) is an independent agency of the United States federal government responsible for providing postal service in the United States, including its insular areas and associated states. It is one of the few government agencies explicitly authorized by the United States Constitution.

About USPS e-VS (Electronic Verification System)

The e-VS, or Electronic Verification System, allows high-volume package mailers and package consolidators to document and pay postage, including special service fees, using electronic manifest files. The files are transmitted over the Internet to a Postal Service database. e-VS is designed to make it easy for high-volume package mailers to take advantage of destination entry rates.

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce. We have premium extensions related to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. Thats it – you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?

If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at the plugin support section on WordPress org. Our team will respond back soon.

After the setup, my site is still saying “There doesn‘t seem to be any available shipping methods”.

You can enable debug in settings and debug messages will start showing up on the cart/checkout page, from which you will get a clue what is the issue about. Hope the USPS shipping method is enabled. Product dimensions and weight is configured correctly.
sections.changelog:
2.0.1

  • Tested with WordPress 6.4
  • Improved user authentication process with the addition of the password input field under the General tab

2.0.0

  • Tested with PHP 8.2
  • Made Compatible with HPOS

1.5.3

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.2
  • Tested with WordPress 6.3

1.5.2

  • Replaced First Class service with USPS Ground Advantage

1.5.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.8
  • Tested with WordPress 6.2

1.5.0

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.5

1.4.9

  • Tested with WordPress 6.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.6
  • Tested with WordPress 6.0

1.4.7

  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.4

1.4.6

  • Tested with WordPress 5.9

1.4.5

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.9

1.4.4

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.8

1.4.3

  • Code Sniffer changes were added
  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.7

1.4.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.6
  • Tested with WordPress 5.8

1.4.1

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 5.5
  • Major UI changes.
  • Fallback rate now works only when there is no response from the server.
  • Flat rate does not show if wrong request is sent.

1.1.0

  • Choose desired service selection (Most requested feature).
  • Clean and improved settings page.
  • Stability improvements.

1.0.0

  • Realtime Shipping Rates

sections.reviews:
Works best for me

By gimraan on October 30, 2023

Good plugin and good support. Works really well for me

Premium plugin behind free plugin

By muramasa on July 28, 2023

It's baffling that the premium version of this plugin hasn't been updated since November, and is missing several key features.

Works for me!

By midshorediesel on June 6, 2023

Quick, easy, and accurate USPS rates! Reasonable annual subscription cost!

I love this Plugin

By hmjahid99 on September 5, 2022

Nice plugin I love this
